claim: Flublok contains 45 micrograms (mcg) of HA per strain vs 15 mcg of HA per strain in a standard-dose influenza vaccine.

extracted_evidence.quote: b RIV4: Flublok. c SD-IIV4: Afluria, Fluarix, FluLaval, Standard Dose Fluzone and FlucelVax.
extracted_evidence.relevance_explanation: This quote identifies RIV4 as Flublok and SD-IIV4 as standard-dose influenza vaccines, which is necessary context for understanding which products are being compared in the claim about HA content.

extracted_evidence.quote: RIV4 was Flublok and Adj-IV was FluAd. Other independent variables were age, influenza season (2018-2019 and 2019-2020), sex, race and presence of one or more high risk conditions.
extracted_evidence.relevance_explanation: This quote confirms that RIV4 refers to Flublok, directly linking the product name to the vaccine type discussed in the claim.

extracted_evidence.quote: Standard Dose Fluzone and FlucelVax. HD-IIV4 was High Dose Fluzone, RIV4 was Flublok and Adj-IV was FluAd.
extracted_evidence.relevance_explanation: This quote again clarifies that RIV4 is Flublok and SD-IIV4 includes standard-dose vaccines like Fluzone and FlucelVax, which is necessary to establish the context for the HA content comparison.
